abstract: California police arrest unidentified 15-year-old boy in connection with death of 8-year-old girl Madyson Middleton at Tanery Arts Center housing complex in Santa Cruz, Calif.
lead_paragraph: A 15-year-old boy lured an 8-year-old girl into his apartment in Santa Cruz, Calif., and killed her before hiding her body in a recycling bin, the police said Tuesday.
snippet: A 15-year-old boy lured an 8-year-old girl into his apartment in Santa Cruz, Calif., and killed her before hiding her body in a recycling bin, the police said Tuesday.
